author: mmasciov
body:
### PR description:

Update selection for HLT track validator, and cleaning of deprecated collections:
 - deprecated HLT track collections are removed, only for Run-3;
 - cuts on tracking particles for HLT track validator are updated, to be closer to offline.

### PR validation:

PR only updates default cuts for HLT tracking validation, with no change in physics.

FYI: @mmusich, @vmariani, @AdrianoDee, @kjpena, @slezki
title: Update selection for HLT tracking validation
